A sum of money borrowed from a financial institution or bank to purchase a house.
Home loans consist of an adjustable or fixed interest rate and payment terms.
A home-purchase loan amount is utilized to buy a residential property
Financial institutions usually provide up to 80-85% of the market value of the house as loan amount.

For salaried professionals, about 40% of monthly gross income can be considered as monthly EMI against the loan,Net monthly income should be equal to or more than Rs. 25,000 to be eligible for a home loan,All Indian Residents are eligible to avail a home loan,Applicants with a good credit score or CIBIL score have a higher chance of getting home loan approval than the applicants with poor credit score
Land-purchase loan, Home-purchase loan, Home-construction loan, Home-extension loans, Home-improvement loans, NRI-home loans, Home-conversion loans.
Land-purchase loan, Home-purchase loan, Home-construction loan, Home-extension loans, Home-improvement loans, NRI-home loans, Home-conversion loans.
Any person who wishes to add space to their existing Apartment/Floor/Row house can avail a Home Extension Loan from bank
Home Extension Loans, you now have the chance to make that dream of having a bigger house a reality, and at the same time, ensure that your family is comfortable.
if you are looking to buy a plot, you may not be eligible for a home loan, but for a land loan.
Home loans are available only for the property already constructed, under construction or likely to undergo construction soon.
For funding the purchase of a vacant plot, you will have to go for a land loan instead.
A mortgage is a loan from a bank or lender to help you finance the purchase of a home.
When you take out a mortgage, you make a promise to repay the money you've borrowed, plus an agreed-upon interest rate.
Financial institutions usually provide up to 80-85% of the market value of the house as loan amount.
Home loan is generally taken either to buy flat/house, construction of house or renovation.
